D

dist(Location) - Method in class gametools.Location
Calculates the distance between two points using pythagorean theorem.
DR_EAST - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Movement in the east (right) direction.
DR_NORTH - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Movement in the north (upward) direction.
DR_NORTHEAST - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Diagonal movement in the north east (upward and rightward) direction.
DR_NORTHWEST - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Diagonal movement in the north west (upward and leftward) direction.
DR_SOUTH - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Movement in the south (downward) direction.
DR_SOUTHEAST - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Diagonal movement in the south east (downward and rightward) direction.
DR_SOUTHWEST - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Diagonal movement in the south west (downward and leftward) direction.
DR_UNDEFINED - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
No movement or movement that does not follow a pre-defined direction.
DR_WEST - Static variable in class gametools.Sprite
Movement in the west (left) direction.
draw() - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Draws the sprite and updates its animation.
drawAll() - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Runs the draw method on every sprite and removes sprites as necessary.
